entry.title: P2QRH / BIP-360 Update
entry.summary: The email to Tim touches upon the evaluation of a spreadsheet that appears to be related to financial calculations, possibly within the context of cryptocurrency. The sender acknowledges the sense in Tim's spreadsheet and inquires about the inclusion of an attestation discount, suggesting a specific consideration or adjustment might have been overlooked or needs clarification. Further, the sender shares their own calculations which seem to mirror or complement the discussion at hand, providing a link to these calculations for reference ([similar calculations](https://x.com/cryptoquick/status/1866986505434264047)). This exchange occurs within the setting of a specialized group, specifically the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List," indicating that the conversation is part of a broader dialogue among individuals engaged in bitcoin development or interested in cryptocurrency-related developments. The nature of this exchange underscores the collaborative and inquisitive environment that characterizes such groups, where members actively share resources, seek advice, and refine their approaches to complex issues surrounding cryptocurrency.
